entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending before morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 40%
